Package jsky.science

Contains utility classes from the NGST Scientist's Expert Assistant package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MrqFit.MrqFunc The funcs argument must implement this interface
ScienceObjectModel defines the bare minimal functionality that an class must implement to interact within a Science data model.
ScienceObjectNodeModel defines the extended capabilies of more complex science objects The two main features that implementers of this interface must support is:
a) support for a data source containing a full set of data of which the science object instance has only a slice
b) support for having additional ScienceObjectModels as "children".
Spectrum covering abstract class for Spectra distribution classes
Wavelength1DModel Highest level interface for a one-dimensional list of quantity as a function of wavelength
 

Class Summary
AbstractScienceObject Basic default implementation of the ScienceObjectModel interface
AbstractScienceObjectNode default implementation of the ScienceObjectNodeModel.
AbstractWavelength1D abstract class that provides functionality common to most wavelength1d's without committing to the underlying storage structure of the dataset.
Constants Constants class is a static class that contains various scientific/ and astronomical constants.
Coordinates A position in the World Coordinate System.
CoordinatesOffset The difference between two coordinates in the World Coordinate System.
IQE Estimate parameters for the Image Quality using a small frame around the object.
MathUtilities MathUtilities class is a static class that contains methods are generic in value.
MrqFit Nonlinear Model fit.
Passband Passband class provides support for range of wavelengths.
ProperMotion The apparent motion of an object on the celestial sphere.
Quantity Quantity, abstract super class of double values that have measurement units
QuantityRange aA range object which contain two quantities to make up the range
Redshift Redshift, an object to minimize problems with redshift units
Spectrum1DArray implements Spectrum as a Wavelength1DArray
Time Time, an object to manage units of Time.
Wavelength Wavelength, an object to minimize problems with wavelength units
Wavelength1DArray Implements the Wavelength1DModel as a pair of arrays one containing wavelength points and the other containing data values at each of those wavelengths.
Wavelength1DFormula implements a wavelength1Dmodel as a formula value=f(wavelength) with a minimum and maximum wavelength, and a number of expected points
 

Exception Summary
UnitsNotSupportedException The WavelengthNotInPassbandException may be thrown by an exposure when determines that the target wavelength for spectroscopy is not within the range of the selected grating.
WavelengthArrayParseException The WavelengthParseException may be thrown by the parse() method of WavelengthArrayDataSet while trying to parse data from a ReaderStream
WavelengthNotInPassbandException The WavelengthNotInPassbandException may be thrown by an exposure when determines that the target wavelength for spectroscopy is not within the range of the selected grating.
 

Package jsky.science Description

Contains utility classes from the NGST Scientist's Expert Assistant package.
